title: The First Rule of Pandemic Travel Is Read Everything About Local Lawsâ€”Twice
sub_head: A wide variety of rules on vaccines, masks and testing creates extra stress and confusion for travelers
body:
Anyone hoping to comply with the latest Covid-related travel restrictions should start by assuming they are nothing like the ones in the city, state or country next door to their destination.
Countries have been swift to impose new travel restrictions due to concerns about the Omicron variant. Each destination sets its own requirements, and the rules are far from consistent, which can cause extra stress and confusion for travelers.
